comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: As best as I can tell: Powhatan Roberts Robinson (1867-1939) was president of the New York Sporting Goods Company and an author. He was born in 1867 in Virginia. He died in 1939. I added him to Wikipedia, but there is so little I found in my research. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/5321564620/] en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Powhatan_Roberts_Robinson
